import torch
import time
import sys
sys.path.insert(0, '/home/ubuntu/OmniPerf-Bench/perf-agents-bench/.work/worktrees/sglang_core/sglang_sonnet45_rerun_c2bd094d/python')

from sglang.srt.layers.moe.ep_moe.kernels import run_moe_ep_preproess, deepep_run_moe_deep_preprocess

# Benchmark the MoE align block size operation
num_tokens = 4096
num_experts = 64
topk = 2

# Create input data
topk_ids = torch.randint(0, num_experts, (num_tokens, topk), dtype=torch.int32, device='cuda')

# Warmup
for _ in range(5):
    reorder_topk_ids, src2dst, seg_indptr = run_moe_ep_preproess(topk_ids, num_experts)
    torch.cuda.synchronize()

# Time the operation
torch.cuda.synchronize()
start = time.time()

for _ in range(100):
    reorder_topk_ids, src2dst, seg_indptr = run_moe_ep_preproess(topk_ids, num_experts)

torch.cuda.synchronize()
duration = time.time() - start

print(f"run_moe_ep_preproess Duration: {duration:.4f} seconds (avg: {duration/100:.6f}s)")

# Also test deepep version
topk_ids_flat = torch.randint(0, num_experts, (num_tokens * topk,), dtype=torch.int32, device='cuda')

# Warmup
for _ in range(5):
    reorder_topk_ids, src2dst, seg_indptr = deepep_run_moe_deep_preprocess(topk_ids_flat, num_experts)
    torch.cuda.synchronize()

# Time the operation

start = time.time()

torch.cuda.synchronize()
duration = time.time() - start

print(f"deepep_run_moe_deep_preprocess Duration: {duration:.4f} seconds (avg: {duration/100:.6f}s)")
